org.kramerlab.vines

Class GumbelCopula

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kramerlab.vines.AbstractCopula
      • org.kramerlab.vines.GumbelCopula
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Copula

    public class GumbelCopula
extends AbstractCopula
    This is a placeholder for the Gumpel copula family. It is not implemented yet.
    Author:
    Christian Lamberty (clamber@students.uni-mainz.de)

        y - an observation from another random variable.

      • hFunction

        public double hFunction(double x,
                        double y)
        Description copied from interface: Copula
        The h-function for the copula. It is used to create pseudo observations.
        Parameters:
        x - to be conditioned parameter
        y - to be conditioning parameter
        Returns:
        returns the constrained value x|y.

      • inverseHFunction

        public double inverseHFunction(double x,
                               double y)
        Description copied from interface: Copula
        The inverse h-function for the copula. It is used to de-transform the values for sampling.
        Parameters:
        x - to be unconditioned parameter
        y - the conditioning parameter
        Returns:
        returns the unconditioned value.
        If x is z|y, the method returns z.

      • tau

        public double tau()
        Description copied from interface: Copula
        Copula based Kendall's tau calculation.
        This is a function to get the tau value, based on a Kendall's tau calculation function for the copula family.
        Returns:
        returns the tau value of the copula.

      • name

        public java.lang.String name()
        Description copied from interface: Copula
        Get the copula name. It is used to differentiate the copulae for visualization.
        Returns:
        returns the copula name.
